channel.title: 317 PI Pest Control
channel.description:
Hello! Im Using PI Base , And I Want To Change The Rewards For Pest Control And also how many points you need for them! :) thanks! What File Is It Please?
Thanks

item.title: 317 PI Pest Control

@neil1111 wrote:

if you want to change the items when you trade the knight, go to “data\cfg”, and it will be shops.cfg find the shop and add/remove the items you want

How do i change the items that are the rewards?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 PI Pest Control
item.dc:creator: @zattion zattion
item.description:
@zattion wrote:

To change how many points u get go to: -> src-> server-> model-> minigames-> PestControl
Then in pestcontrol.java search for: c.pcPoints then change that to how many u want

to change how many points the items should cost go to : -> src-> server-> model-> shops-> ShopAssistant
Then in ShopAssistant.java search for: public int getSpecialItemValue then find the item code for the item u want to change. then under the code u see return (and how many points the items above costs); just change that to how many points u like it to be;)

Void_knight_top = 8839
Void_knight_robe = 8840
Void_knight_mace = 8841
Void_knight_gloves = 8842

u see more item codes in item.java

hope it helps

Read full topic
